name: Square Setter Demo
description:
Hey Guys, this is a Demo for my very first Game "Square Setter".

It's a small "Arcadey" Game where you need to conquer the Map and must not get hit by the blue ball.

I hope you guys enjoy! :)

Full Version coming soon! 

Note: This is just a real quick WebGL Port i made, it will be developed for Android. So please don't judge me for the poor Port :P

Controls: Use W,A,S,D or the Arrow Keys to change direction.
